reporter-output.line: Test Case Name : Create New Network Discovery </stong></br>
<stong> Step 2 : Enter valide 'UserName' & 'Password' And Click on Login button </stong></br>
<stong> Step 3 : Click on 'Admin' in left navigation menu. Click on 'Network Discovery' under 'Admin' section. </stong></br>
<stong> Step 4 : Click on 'Save' button without filling Required field </stong></br>
Create New Discovery Label is Displayed on Create New Discovery </br>
<center> Error Message is Displayed with Messaage As Below </br> <center>Discovery Name is required. Credential (s) is required. Device Type (s) is required. </center> </br> </center> </br>
<stong> Step 5 : fill all Required field and click on save button </stong></br>
